creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: panel; predominately brown; edging on short sides--purple on one side, floral print on other side; central band has green, blue, brown, red and yellow geometric weaving on cream; top and bottom bands are brown with stripes and patterned bands in predominately white and greens; short red, white and blue fringe on one side
title: Skirt
